column1: I look forward to fighting for conservative policies that make Idaho thrive and to continue to deliver results for our great state and nation. 🇺🇸
I’m deeply honored to represent the people of Idaho in Congress and I’m grateful for the tremendous outpouring of support by the voters of the Second Congressional District.
